com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart.cobbler
Class CobblerXMLRPCHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart.cobbler.CobblerXMLRPCHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLRPCInvoker
public class CobblerXMLRPCHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLRPCInvoker

XMLRPCHelper - class that contains wraps calls to Redstone's XMLRPC client. Intentionally implements the XMLRPCInvoker interface so we can also provide a mock implementation to our unit tests so they don't require an actual cobbler server.
